summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney to Wendy regarding travel arrangements for a fact witness scheduled to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial on December 9 or 10, 2021. The email includes a travel request attachment and notes the witness's planned travel dates.

persons.name: Wendy
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding travel arrangements for a fact witness in the Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sent an email to Wendy attaching a travel request for a fact witness in the Maxwell trial, indicating the witness's expected testimony dates.

connections.description: The AUSA is communicating with Wendy regarding logistical arrangements for a trial witness.

events.title: Expected witness testimony in Maxwell trial
events.description: A fact witness is expected to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

events.title: Alternative expected witness testimony in Maxwell trial
events.description: A fact witness is expected to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, with December 10 noted as an alternative date.

events.title: Witness travel to New York
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to fly into New York for the Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: A fact witness is scheduled to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial on either December 9 or 10, 2021.
Travel arrangements were being coordinated for the witness to fly in on December 8 and out on December 10, 2021.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates ongoing trial preparation and witness logistics management in November 2021.
